tagline: Precision Ductile Iron Manufacturing for Modern Infrastructure
description: Specializing in manhole covers, automobile parts, and custom castings.

about.summary: Durgapur Infra Projects Pvt. Ltd. operates a state-of-the-art ductile iron facility specializing in manhole covers, automobile parts, and custom castings. Founded in 2016 by industry veterans Manoj and Neeraj Garg, DIPPL combines technical excellence with operational efficiency.
about.coreActivities: Operate a state-of-the-art ductile iron manufacturing facility in Durgapur. Specialize in manhole covers, automobile parts, and other ductile iron castings using semi-automatic green sand molding process for precision and efficiency.

factory.address: JL. No. 58, Gopalpur Gram Panchayat, P.S. Kanksa, Village Bamunara, Dist. Paschim Bardhaman, West Bengal – 713212
factory.process: Green Sand Molding with semi-automatic setup ensuring precision and high throughput.
factory.location: Situated in Paschim Bardhaman, West Bengal. Connected via rail, road, highways. ~150 km from Howrah Railway Station & Kolkata Airport.

products.title: Municipal Casting of Gray and Ductile Iron
products.description: High-strength, corrosion-resistant municipal castings built to IS standards. Our precision manufacturing ensures durability and reliability for urban infrastructure.

products.title: Cast Iron Ingot Moulds and Centre Columns
products.description: Precision-molded ingot moulds for metallurgical industries. Engineered for consistent performance and extended service life.

products.title: Locomotive / Railway Castings
products.description: Custom iron castings for locomotive and rail infrastructure. Built to meet stringent railway specifications and safety standards.

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing Infrastructure
manufacturing.description: Automated molding lines, induction furnaces, shot blasting, and fettling units. State-of-the-art equipment ensuring precision and efficiency.

testing.title: Testing & Inspection Infrastructure
testing.description: In-house metallurgical lab with spectrometer, tensile testing, and hardness analysis. Comprehensive quality control at every stage.

it.title: IT Infrastructure
it.description: ERP-integrated systems for process monitoring and quality tracking. Digital transformation for operational excellence.

design.title: Design & Development
design.description: CAD-based design & simulation for prototype and mass casting. Innovation-driven approach to product development.

assurance.title: Quality Assurance
assurance.description: Stringent QA checks at every stage of production. From raw material inspection to final product testing.

laboratory.title: Our Laboratory
laboratory.description: Equipped for chemical, mechanical, and microstructure analysis. Advanced testing capabilities ensuring product excellence.

certifications.title: Certifications
certifications.description: ISO certified operations ensuring international quality standards. Committed to excellence and continuous improvement.
